summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley between Blocks 3, Pettit's University Addition and Block 11, Assessor's Plat of University Heights Addition, being the alley from East 50th Street to East 52nd Street, between 12th Avenue Northeast and Brooklyn Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 103463, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
